The letter circulated under the name of: Crime Prevention Council of India' warns social media users from posting political propaganda posts before the 2019 elections.
The letter includes a statement in Hindi: advising social media users connected to Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, WhatsApp, and other networks not to share political propaganda posts, photos, and posters before the upcoming elections.
The letter concludes by mentioning the p: level special surveillance team of the Election Commission.
The website of: Crime Prevention Council of India' (www.cpcindiaonline.com) is not affiliated with the Indian government, as it does not have the domain ending in 'gov.in' or 'nic.in' like official government websites.
